titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 3-Bromo-N-[4-chloro-2-methyl-6-[(methylamino)carbonyl]phenyl]-1 H-pyrazole-5-carboxamide (Chlorantraniliprole).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/28/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 3-Bromo-N-[4-chloro-2-methyl-6-[(methylamino)carbonyl]phenyl]-1 H-pyrazole-5-carboxamide (Chlorantraniliprole).
